tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE early_childhood_education_curriculum (
  id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  lesson_plan_id INT,
  lesson_title TEXT,
  lesson_description TEXT,
  lesson_objectives TEXT,
  materials_needed TEXT,
  suggested_activities TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE lesson_plans ( 
lesson_plan_id UUID PRIMARY KEY, 
lesson_name VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL, 
objective TEXT, 
curriculum_id UUID NOT NULL, 
FOREIGN KEY (curriculum_id) REFERENCES curriculum(curriculum_id) 
);

CREATE TABLE early_childhood_education_curriculum (
    curriculum_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    curriculum_name VARCHAR(255),
    age_group VARCHAR(50),
    learning_domain VARCHAR(50),
    description TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE lesson_plans (
    lesson_plan_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    lesson_title VARCHAR(255),
    curriculum_id INT,
    duration_hours INT,
    lesson_objectives TEXT,
    materials_needed TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE curriculum_activities (
    activity_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    activity_name VARCHAR(255),
    lesson_plan_id INT,
    activity_type VARCHAR(50),
    activity_description TEXT
);
